name: Hako Forest
description:
The story take place in a poor little village of Sörg next to Hako forest Ollie Schwartz, a young diligent villager He received a letter from his long lost father. The heartbreaking news of his father’s passing and the curiosity of the unknown box of fortune lead his adventure to Hako Forest.

IUSTINA IOSUB (3D Art, Animation)
AHMAD KALATIANI (Programming)
PARASTOU PARHIZKAR (3D Art)
HARUKI WEN (2D Art, Narrative)
ANISS ARMA (Game Design, Narrative)
